What is your overall assessment of this course
The course was well organized to facilitate student learning
I received clear feedback that improved my learning

Comments_List: Introduction to SQL and database design
the course helps me develop a thorough understanding about database systems.

I gained the skills of writing complex SQL to manipulate data in database. Besides, I learnt a lot advanced topics about database system such as E-R design, file storage, query processing and transaction.
A general overview of databases and storage. General knowledge that any CS major should know.
knowledge about database and how to use SQL to implement a system.
A deep understanding about how data is stored in the database and how to optimize query language.
I have learned the basics about database systems.
database system utilization and design
Usage of SQL, database design and implementation
The course gives a good overview of SQL and database design although it would be good to have more practical applications of the ideas in the later part of the semester like transactions.
this course covers all important aspects about database systems, which can definitely help me build my future career.

The strength is we can learn a lot if we work hard, and the knowledge is very important and useful. The weakness is there are so many topics covered and we cannot get a deep understanding of each of them.
We may have finished the course material had Avi not arrived ten minutes late to every class. I expected better.
This class is very reasonable! We cover a reasonable amount of material and have reasonable tests and projects.
I think the course cover a lot about database and I think it is good. On the other hand, I think the group for final project should be smaller, like 2 - 3 students a group.

The strength is that Avi teaches quite well. The weakness is that there are some errors in the slides. And the course website cannot be visited using safari because of unsafe script. Another weakness is that TA should declare no partial credits before rather than deduct all points without noticing students.
The workload of assignments is not enough for beginners.
More interaction and prep will be good.
Course is well designed. TA could provide more help. Guides for final project were limited.
Yes, if gives a good intro to databases without much work
Yes if they want to learn database system well.
Yes.
You will learn about databases. But Avi doesn't care about you. Don't expect him to. Find an online course instead.
This is a very reasonable CS elective. The material is general and fairly basic. I felt like I learned a lot about real life databases work. It has a good balance of theory and application.
I would recommend this course to another student because the knowledge learned from this course would be very useful in future work.
yes
Great, TA's and professor very helpful. Slides well organized.
Yes. This course provides important and sufficient knowledge for database and operating system.
